title: Most important export partner countries for Bangladesh in 2017
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share in total export for 6 number of Countrys.
The Share in total export is appeared to be the highest at Country Germany and lowest at Country Italy.
The difference of Share in total export between the highest and lowest Country is 8.8.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share in total export for 6 number of Countrys.
The Share in total export is highest at Country Germany and lowest at Country Italy.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share in total export for 6 number of Countrys.
The Share in total export is appeared to be the highest at Country Germany and lowest at Country Italy.
The difference of Share in total export between the highest and lowest Country is 8.8.
max_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Share in total export in each Country on the y axis.
The Share in total export is appeared to be the highest at Country Germany and lowest at Country Italy.
There is a difference of 8.8 between the maximum Country Germany and minimum Country Italy.
Country Germany is higher than any other Countrys with value 12.9, followed by , and United Kingdom. Down to Country Italy with the lowest value 4.1.
The Country Germany tends to be 1.6 percent higher than average.
The Share in total export is 48.3 if we add up values of all Countrys.
